description.full: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, Spanish, Danish, Dutch, Norwegian, Russian,  Swedish.   Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  Join all of the classic Toy Story characters as Woody, Buzz and the rest of the gang stage their own zany, fun-filled carnival.  Inspired by the 4D attractions at Disneyland and Walt Disney World, “Toy Story Mania!” allows players to participate in 30 carnival-inspired shooting galleries.  Includes a variety of addictive mini-games and power-ups that will enhance your overall gameplay experience.
description.short: Join all of the classic Toy Story characters as Woody, Buzz and the rest of the gang stage their own zany, fun-filled carnival.  Enjoy 30 carnival-inspired shooting galleries.
